Structs/QPEngineStarted.html.name: QPEngineStarted
Structs/QPEngineStarted.html.abstract: Event triggered when the Engine receives the first GPS update, which is required to perform the initial operations

Structs/QPConnectivityChangedEvent.html.name: QPConnectivityChangedEvent
Structs/QPConnectivityChangedEvent.html.abstract: Event triggered when the network status changes, e.g. from connected to disconnected

Structs/QPLocationUpdatedEvent.html.name: QPLocationUpdatedEvent
Structs/QPLocationUpdatedEvent.html.abstract: Event triggered when the Engine receives a GPS update from the system module

Structs/QPEnteredVSignEvent.html.name: QPEnteredVSignEvent
Structs/QPEnteredVSignEvent.html.abstract: Event triggered when the Engine detects the user has entered a VSign

Structs/QPNotifiedVSignEvent.html.name: QPNotifiedVSignEvent
Structs/QPNotifiedVSignEvent.html.abstract: Event triggered when a VSign has been notified to the user

Structs/QPVSignsFetchedEvent.html.name: QPVSignsFetchedEvent
Structs/QPVSignsFetchedEvent.html.abstract: Event triggered when the Engine fetches the list of vSigns from the API

Structs/QPExitedApiCoverageRegionEvent.h.name: QPExitedApiCoverageRegionEvent
Structs/QPExitedApiCoverageRegionEvent.h.abstract: Event triggered when the Engine detects that the user has exited the circular region coveder by the

Structs/QPResetVSignStatus.html.name: QPResetVSignStatus
Structs/QPResetVSignStatus.html.abstract: Event triggered when the vSign notified status has been reset.

Structs/QPGPSUpdatesPaused.html.name: QPGPSUpdatesPaused
Structs/QPGPSUpdatesPaused.html.abstract: Event triggered when iOS notified the Engine that GPS updates have been suspended because of inactivity.

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: apiBaseUrl
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: Base API url

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: apiDomain
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: Default API domain

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: apiPollInterval
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: Controls how often (in seconds) we poll the API for new vSigns

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: apiCoverageRadius
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: Value (in meters) passed to the API as the vsign coverage radius. A value of 1000 would

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: bearingToleranceDegrees
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: Value in degrees controlling the tolerance for the angle used to detect the entering direction for a vsign

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: enableBearingChecks
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: Controls if the entering angle should be used when detecting if a visgin is being entered

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: gpsLocationMaxAgeSeconds
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: GPS updates older than this value (in seconds) will be discarded as outdated.

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: gpsLocationMinHorizontalAccuracy
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: GPS updates that fall outside of this accurancy range (in meters) will be discarded as too inaccurate to be used.

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: notifiedTimeoutSeconds
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: Notified vSigns will be re-notified again once re-entered if the previous notification is older than

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: notifiedMinDistanceInMeters
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: Notified vSigns will be re-notified again once re-entered if the user has reached this min distance (in meters)

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: ttsVolume
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: Volume for the TTS messages

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: language
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: Language used to display and read vsign messages

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: syncMetricsInterval
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: Controls how often buffered metrics are sent to the API

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: gpsDefaultAccuracy
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: Controls how often buffered metrics are sent to the API

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: gpsPausesLocationUpdatesAutomatically
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: Automatically pauses GPS updates if the system determines updates are not strictly requires

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.name: gpsDistanceFilter
Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: Controls how often GPS updates are required, based on the user movements.

Classes/QPSettings.html#/s:14QuandoPasso.abstract: Restores saved settings

Classes/QPEngine.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Returns the current Device ID, as returned by iOS

Classes/QPEngine.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Clears the notification statuses for all known vSigns

Classes/QPEngine.html#/c:@CM@QuandoPasso.abstract: Delegate method called when a monitored geofence location is exited.

Classes/QPEngine.html#/c:@CM@QuandoPasso.abstract: Delegate method called when GPS updates are suspended by the system, commonly

Classes/QPEngine.html#/c:@CM@QuandoPasso.abstract: Delegate method called when the GPS permissions are updated by the user, for example by going

Classes/QPEngine.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: trackAppBecameActive()
Classes/QPEngine.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Tracks when the application is returned to foreground

Classes/QPEngine.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: trackAppInBackground()
Classes/QPEngine.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Tracks when the application is moved into background

Classes/QPSignalMessage.html#/s:14Quando.name: lang
Classes/QPSignalMessage.html#/s:14Quando.abstract: Language code, as returned by the API.

Classes/QPSignalMessage.html#/s:14Quando.name: init(json:)
Classes/QPSignalMessage.html#/s:14Quando.abstract: Initialises a SignalMessage from a JSON data structure.

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: region
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: CoreLocation circular region representing the geographic area covered by the vSign

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: id
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: API id for the vSign

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: bearings
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: List of bearings associated the vSign

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: messages
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: List of messages (TTS text)

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: entered
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Stores if the vSign has been entered by the user

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: notified
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Stores if the vSign has been notified to the user

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: lastEnteredAt
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Date object storing when the vSign has been last entered by the user.

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: lastNotifiedAt
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Date object storing when the vSign has been last notified to the user.

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: mainBearing
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Returns the first item from the list of bearings linked to the vSign.

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: hasBearings
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Determines if the vSign has any bearing value associated to it.

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: notificationAgeInSeconds
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Number of seconds since the vSign was last notified

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: enteredAgeInSeconds
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Number of seconds since the vSign was last entered.

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: init(json:)
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Initialises a vSign from a JSON data structure.

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: getMessage(byLang:)
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Returns a matching message - if any - for the given language code

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: markAsNotified()
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Mark the vSign as notified. Called by the Engine after the logic to match vSign is run.

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: resetNotified()
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Resets the internal notification status for a vSign. Normally this happens when the user move

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: markAsEntered()
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Marks the vSign as entered by the user. Manily used to avoid notifying the user again once the area has been entered.

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: resetEntered()
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Resets the entered status

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: resetStatus()
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Resets both entered and notified statuses

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: updateFrom(otherSignal:)
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Updates some of the current properties from another vSign instance. Used to update the vSign

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: distanceFromCenter(point:)
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Calculates the distance between the given point and the center of the vSign.

Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.name: distanceFromArea(point:)
Classes/QPSignal.html#/s:14QuandoPassoLi.abstract: Calculates the distance between the given point and the border of the coverage area.

Classes/MetricsManager.html#/s:14QuandoP.name: timeInterval
Classes/MetricsManager.html#/s:14QuandoP.abstract: Controls how often buffered metrics are sent to the API.

Classes/MetricsManager.html.name: MetricsManager
Classes/MetricsManager.html.abstract: Class responsible for buffering and sending metrics to the API.

Classes/QPSignalMessage.html.name: QPSignalMessage
Classes/QPSignalMessage.html.abstract: Data Model class representing a TTS message linked to a vSign.

Classes/QPEngine.html.name: QPEngine
Classes/QPEngine.html.abstract: Main class used by clients to integrate QuandoPasso SDK functionalities in their apps.
